meanings.definition: The quality or state of being rectangular.
meanings.sent1: The rectangularity of the table made it easy to fit in the corner.
meanings.sent2: The rectangularity of the room allowed for efficient furniture arrangement.
meanings.sent3: The rectangularity of the cake made it look like a giant brownie.
meanings.sent4: Her strict adherence to rectangularity in her designs gave her work a modern edge.
meanings.sent5: The rectangularity of the building's windows created a striking pattern on the facade.

meanings.definition: The property of having a rectangular shape.
meanings.sent1: The perfect rectangularity of the mirror reflected the entire room.
meanings.sent2: The rectangularity of the pool made it ideal for swimming laps.
meanings.sent3: The rectangularity of the sandwich was so precise, it looked like it came from a food magazine photoshoot.
meanings.sent4: The rectangularity of the garden beds gave the backyard a neat and organized appearance.
meanings.sent5: The rectangularity of the bookshelf allowed for easy categorization of books by genre.
